overview: Boy, if these walls could talk! This is one sexy house! And everyone, whether it be the owners, the real-estate agents, or any other red-blooded males, everyone wants to fuck! The laborers drop their tools to drop their pants and hump each other like animals. And the new occupants are going to go orgy crazy. Of particular interest: the actors are gorgeous hunks and when they come, it's like, «Look, Ma, no hands!» So, come on inside!
title: The Mansion
